item.title: DynamoDB Accelerator
item.description: Related Notes AWS Wiki DynamoDB DAX - DynamoDB Accelerator DAX is a fully managed, highly available, in-memory cache for Amazon DynamoDB that delivers up to a 10 times performance improvement - from milliseconds to microseconds - even at millions of requests per second.

item.title: Elasticache
item.description: Related Notes AWS Wiki Elasticache Amazon Elasticache improves the performance of your database through caching query results.
